title: Amir Maqam condemns terrorist attack in Hangu
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 24 (APP): Federal Minister for Kashmir and Gilgit-Baltistan Affairs, Engineer Amir Maqam, on Friday strongly condemned the terrorist attack carried out by the Indian-backed group “Fitna Hindustan” in Hangu.

In a statement, the minister said that terrorists are the enemies of Pakistan and peace in the region.

Paying tribute to SP Operations Asad Zubair and other police personnel who embraced martyrdom in the incident, Amir Maqam lauded the unwavering courage and determination of the country’s security forces and citizens in the fight against terrorism.

“May Almighty Allah elevate the ranks of the martyrs and grant patience to their bereaved families,” he added.
